attributes.action: Have a more equitable approach to collecting CSA arrears.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Though the policy to collect child maintainance arrears is supported, the present 2 year steer to collect CSA arrears is causing significant detriment to NRP's especially those who are also paying regular maintainance. At a time of economic downturn including a credit crunch a revised approach, the policy steer on CSA arrears needs be reflect the current difficulties that NRP's might be facing financially.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
